duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with organizing and updating all documents on the ALE Shared Drive.
Proof envelopes for any mailings to ensure guest names and addresses are correct before mailing.
Facilitates vendor outreach with Events team.
Assembles specialty items, gift bags, and swag bags for events.
Tracks the arrival and check-in of all rented inventory to ensure all orders are confirmed and accounted for.
Compiles Event Binders for the ALE team consisting of guest lists, seating charts, event timelines, floor plans, and production schedules.
Picks up and drops off items from vendors and retailers.
Inventories ALE office and event supplies post-event and reorganize.
Books travel, hotel accommodations, vans/cars/limos for guests and ALE team.
Creates event timelines and other pertinent information related to each event with the Sr. Event Producers.
Supports the Sr. Event Producers with all functions from planning, load-in, event management, and load-out.
Works with the design team to ensure the day of event styling and setup meets Anna Lucia’s design deck specifications and expectations.
Organizes and inventories rental libraries including, but not limited to, fabric swatches, rental samples, etc.

education_certification.credential: Current college student, pursuing a degree in Event Management or Hospitality preferred.
